alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued May 16 at 5:57PM MST until May 16 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 700 PM MST. * At 557 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Blackwater to near Olberg to 7 miles northwest of Estrella Sailport, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 172 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 132 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 153. Locations impacted include... Goodyear, Casa Grande, Coolidge, Maricopa, Estrella, Arizona City, La Palma, Blackwater, Toltec, Big Horn, Bapchule, Freeman, Estrella Sailport, Olberg and Arizola. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
